title: Categories and Sharepoint Folder Layout
summary: This document contains two sheets: 'Categories-Tags' and 'Sharepoint Folder Layout'. The 'Categories-Tags' sheet lists various document categories such as Meeting Notes, Strategy Memo, Forecast Analysis, and Inventory Report, along with their descriptions and associated tags like demand-planning and supply-planning. The 'Sharepoint Folder Layout' sheet outlines the structure and purpose of folders used for organizing project-related documents, including folders for administrative files, project plans, and client documents.
